Wine Studies

This module allows students to enhance their fundamentals knowledge and understanding of wine but also acquire the various wine opening and service techniques. Moreover, this module provides a systematic approach to wine tasting, allowing them to detect quality factors for wines and develop their upselling capabilities.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Identify the world's major wine-producing regions, their noble grape varietals, their classification systems and quality-control rules.

+  Prepare a wine list according to a context.

+  Distinguish the quality of a wine based on the wine-making and storage process.

+  Apply systematic approach of wine tasting and food pairing in a definite situation.

+  Upsell wine taking in accounts food and guest profile.

+  Explain the fundamentals rule for managing a wine cellar.
